name: Tempus Fugit (HembertMuda, Hypathie, Shika1991, ugotrelis, cam2luxe)
name_original: Tempus Fugit (HembertMuda, Hypathie, Shika1991, ugotrelis, cam2luxe)
description:
Come aboard Tempus Fugit! Pay a fine by talking with strange passengers about their most personal memories. 

Tempus Fugit has been made for Ludum Dare #44 by a team of five :

Camille Blum : 2D/3D artist

Simon Hembert : Programmer

Melissa Petrucci : UI artist - Narrative Design

Anthony Plomion : Sound Designer

Ugo Trelis : Game/Level/Narrative Design
